Detailed Description

odbc+odbc plugin for portable configuration engine

Author:
Mark Spencer <markster@digium.com>

Anthony Minessale II <anthmct@yahoo.com>

  • http://www.unixodbc.org

00171       if (indicator == SQL_NULL_DATA)
00172          rowdata[0] = '\0';
00173       else if (ast_strlen_zero(rowdata)) {
00174          /* Because we encode the empty string for a NULL, we will encode
00175           * actual empty strings as a string containing a single whitespace. */
00176          ast_copy_string(rowdata, " ", sizeof(rowdata));
00177       }
00178 
00179       if ((res != SQL_SUCCESS) && (res != SQL_SUCCESS_WITH_INFO)) {
00180          ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "SQL Get Data error!\n[%s]\n\n", sql);
00181          if (var)
00182             ast_variables_destroy(var);
00183          ast_odbc_release_obj(obj);
00184          return NULL;
00185       }
00186       stringp = rowdata;
00187       while(stringp) {
00188          chunk = strsep(&stringp, ";");
00189          if (prev) {
00190             prev->next = ast_variable_new(coltitle, chunk);
00191             if (prev->next)
00192                prev = prev->next;
00193          } else 
00194             prev = var = ast_variable_new(coltitle, chunk);
00195       }
00196    }
00197 
00198 
00199    SQLFreeHandle (SQL_HANDLE_STMT, stmt);
00200    ast_odbc_release_obj(obj);
00201    return var;
00202 }

00406       SQLFreeHandle (SQL_HANDLE_STMT, stmt);
00407       ast_odbc_release_obj(obj);
00408       return -1;
00409    }
00410    
00411    /* Now bind the parameters */
00412    x = 1;
00413 
00414    while((newparam = va_arg(ap, const char *))) {
00415       newval = va_arg(ap, const char *);
00416       SQLBindParameter(stmt, x++, SQL_PARAM_INPUT, SQL_C_CHAR, SQL_CHAR, strlen(newval), 0, (void *)newval, 0, NULL);
00417    }
00418       
00419    SQLBindParameter(stmt, x++, SQL_PARAM_INPUT, SQL_C_CHAR, SQL_CHAR, strlen(lookup), 0, (void *)lookup, 0, NULL);
00420 
00421    res = ast_odbc_smart_execute(obj, stmt);
00422 
00423    if ((res != SQL_SUCCESS) && (res != SQL_SUCCESS_WITH_INFO)) {
00424       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "SQL Execute error!\n[%s]\n\n", sql);
00425       SQLFreeHandle (SQL_HANDLE_STMT, stmt);
00426       ast_odbc_release_obj(obj);
00427       return -1;
00428    }
00429 
00430    res = SQLRowCount(stmt, &rowcount);
00431    SQLFreeHandle (SQL_HANDLE_STMT, stmt);
00432    ast_odbc_release_obj(obj);
00433 
00434    if ((res != SQL_SUCCESS) && (res != SQL_SUCCESS_WITH_INFO)) {
00435       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "SQL Row Count error!\n[%s]\n\n", sql);
00436       return -1;
00437    }
00438 
00439    if (rowcount >= 0)
00440       return (int)rowcount;
00441 
00442    return -1;
00443 }
